function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Lack of awareness of economic impact of indoor climate","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inaccurate economic calculations for investments and operations","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of adequate ventilation and cooling due to increased space efficiency","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased contamination and heat loads from people and equipment","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Negative consequences of greater efficiency on indoor climate","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Granger causality test results suggest a potential causal relationship between pandemic and gini","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Changes in welfare policies may impose large welfare losses on high-wage workers","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Tax system modifications may lead to welfare losses for high-income earners","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Pandemic events impacting global economies","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unpredictability and exogeneity of pandemic events","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Loss of industry-level details due to country-level data analysis","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Data underestimates true sales figures and installed base of robots","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of robot data beyond 2018 limits the analysis of pandemic impact on robot adoption","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Industry-level labor and capital-related data available only until 2014, limiting the analysis of pandemic impact","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of mathematical models and calculations","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Data privacy and confidentiality","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient documentation and attribution","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Pandemic episodes impacting labor market","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Automation leading to inequality and unemployment","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Disproportionate impact on low-skilled workers, women, youths, and marginalized individuals","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Acceleration of robot adoption displacing low-skilled workers","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges in acquiring new and challenging skill sets leading to a persistent increase in dropouts","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Pandemics leading to increases in the gini coefficient and inequality","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uneven impact of robots on workers with different skill levels","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependent on country fixed effects and global business cycle","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Pandemics increasing robot adoption","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of pandemics on changes in gini coefficients","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Skill-biased technological changes","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Pandemics with severe health consequences and significant economic downturn have a statistically significant impact on robot usage.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Using measures that capture the intensity of pandemic events instead of a binary variable for pandemic events","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inclusion of a recession dummy to control for business cycles","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of log of robot adoption variable to mitigate issues related to the long tail in the distribution of the robotics data","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Pandemic-induced uncertainty leading to increased incentives for automation","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Health risks and reduced labor productivity due to social distancing measures","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential cyber viruses affecting robots","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Pandemics leading to an increase in robot adoption over time","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Global value chains dependent on cross-border capital flows","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Effect of pandemics on trade and offshoring of the production process","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of robots increasing due to pandemics","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Pandemics affecting robot adoption in industries","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate control of global business cycles","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased use of industrial robots may lead to higher risk of disease transmission if not properly managed.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Sparse coverage of service robot data","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inequality in income and wage distribution","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Pandemic events sars, h1n1, mers, ebola","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Data collection from multiple sources may lead to inaccuracies and inconsistencies in the data.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Technological advancements in robotics and automation may lead to increased human-job displacement, affecting the economic and social well-being of workers.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"The covid-19 pandemic has reshaped the nature of work, leading to changes in employment structures and job distribution.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Pandemics leading to persistent increases in inequality","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Acceleration in robotization due to pandemics","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"}]}
